title: Amazon Web Services
summary: Comprehensive cloud computing platform offering scalable infrastructure, storage, databases, and hundreds of other services.
description:
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world's most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform, offering over 200 fully featured services from data centers globally. AWS provides on-demand computing resources, storage solutions, databases, networking, analytics, machine learning, security, and developer tools that enable organizations to scale and grow efficiently.

Core services include EC2 (elastic compute), S3 (object storage), RDS (relational databases), VPC (virtual private cloud), Lambda (serverless computing), and CloudFormation (infrastructure as code). AWS's global infrastructure spans multiple regions and availability zones, providing high availability, fault tolerance, and low latency for applications worldwide.

AWS excels in enterprise environments with comprehensive security features, compliance certifications, cost optimization tools, and extensive partner ecosystem. The platform supports everything from simple web applications to complex machine learning workloads, big data analytics, and enterprise migrations with services like AWS Migration Hub and Database Migration Service.
